snippet: Look there, in the front row of Diane von Furstenberg's runway on Sunday afternoon. Isn't that Oscar de la Renta? And then, wait a sec, Sergey Brin from Google?
abstract: Look there, in the front row of Diane von Furstenberg's runway on Sunday afternoon. Isn't that Oscar de la Renta? And then, wait a sec, Sergey Brin from Google?

headline.main: DVF Gives Google Glasses a Spin on the Runway
